segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's water overflowing from the sink, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it's only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing on a stool to get cookies, are just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman paying attention to what's going on around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be more responsible and aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting really frustrated just watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take control before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness and lack of supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR
